name: id
description: The unique identifier for a fund

name: created_at
description: The date and time at which a fund was created

name: updated_at
description: The date and time at which a fund was last updated

name: name
description: The name for a fund. Must be unique within the associated organization

name: ledger_code
description: If an organization's general ledger software tracks funds by code, this attribute can be used to store the fund's code for reference

name: description
description: A short description that describes how the money given to the fund will be used

name: visibility
description: Controls how a fund is visible on Church Center

name: default
description: This attribute is set to true if a fund is the associated organization's default fund, or false if it isn't

name: color
description: The hex color code that is used to help differentiate the fund from others in Giving, as determined by color_identifier

name: deletable
description: Boolean that tells if you if the fund can be deleted or not
